alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 18 at 12:33PM MST until November 19 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ TO 8 PM CST /7 PM MST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ to 8 PM CST /7 PM MST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
